name: meterit
description: Full-stack device tracking application with dual-deployment architecture

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -t -p "[{name}]" -n client-api,client-frontend,sync-api,sync-mcp,sync-frontend -c "yellowBright,cyanBright,blueBright,magentaBright,greenBright" "npm run client:api" "npm run client:frontend" "npm run sync:api" "npm run sync:mcp" "npm run sync:frontend"
scripts.dev:client: concurrently -k -t -p "[{name}]" -n client-api,client-frontend -c "yellowBright,cyanBright" "npm run client:api" "npm run client:frontend"
scripts.dev:sync: concurrently -k -t -p "[{name}]" -n sync-api,sync-mcp,sync-frontend -c "blueBright,magentaBright,greenBright" "npm run sync:api" "npm run sync:mcp" "npm run sync:frontend"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client/api && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../../sync/api && npm install && cd ../mcp && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:sync
